Jinghong county level city in Xishuangbanna Dai autonomous prefecture 西雙版納傣族自治州|西双版纳傣族自治州[Xi1 shuang1 ban3 na4 Dai3 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

sentences.english: Hainan, Yunnan Rubber Group, the company officially launched operations Yunnan Jinghong City.
sentences.chinese: 海南橡胶集团云南公司在云南景洪市正式挂牌运营。

sentences.english: From Simao we drove southward through the mountains towards Jinghong.
sentences.chinese: 我们的车了从思茅往南开，通过丛山，开往景洪。

sentences.english: In Xishuangbanna the new Jinghong dam has just started operating. Further up, Xiaowan dam will be finished by 2013.
sentences.chinese: 西双版纳的景洪大坝刚刚开始施工。

sentences.english: Village women, all dressed in straw hats and sarongs , harvest rice near Jinghong.
sentences.chinese: 村妇们个个戴斗笠穿围裙，在景洪附近收割稻谷。
